detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in a crinkled, organic cotton weave with wide, elastic shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Open front pockets and narrow, covered elastication at the hems.
Short shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and lace details at the hems. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top, cycling shorts and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top and a flounced trim at the front. Shorts in jersey with an elasticated waist. Jersey hairband with a decorative bow at the front.
Sleeveless unitard in jersey with a zip at the top, seam at the waist and short legs.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dragon fancy dress costume. Sleeveless jersey top section with a hook and loop fastening and appliqués at the back and long legs in soft velour with elastication and padded appliqués at the hems. Padded head with embroidery and appliqués, and a detachable, padded tail at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
NICK VEASEY x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-style jumper in soft, double-knitted pima cotton with a stand-up collar, zip at the front and long sleeves.
Jersey fancy dress cape with a hood with appliqués and a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Earmuffs in faux fur and velour with a reversible sequin motif. Polyester padding.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a press-stud and elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Kids Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a lightly brushed finish. Regular waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Adjustable tab with buttons at the sides and gently tapered, ankle-length legs.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and wide ribbing at the hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Wrapover front with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a concealed zip.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Fitted vest top in organic cotton jersey with spaghetti straps and a narrow lace trim at the top.

Hi-tops in shimmering imitation leather with a lightly padded shaft, appliqués on the tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles. Fluted soles.

Blouse in soft viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets. Embroidery and a raw, frayed hem on the shoulders, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a flounce to the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: CA Poplin regular fit PQ TVP
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.
Knee-length skirt in a gently pleated fine knit with a ribbed, elasticated waistband.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature and a drawstring waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a narrow, detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a rubber print and scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem.
Negligee in soft viscose jersey with a stripe print. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and triangular, lined cups with lace trims.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Wedge-heeled sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets with a taped zip, and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves with imitation leather sections at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in light slub cotton jersey with a lined hood, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Velour rattle in the shape of a rabbit with polyester padding. Size 10.5x13 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in satin with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with round metal buttons. Unlined.

Shirts in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a round neck, sequins on the front and shimmering buttons.
Jacket in washed denim with embroidery, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs, and tabs and buttons at the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.

Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fitted jumper in a soft, patterned knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves and flounces down the front. Opening with buttons at the back, a smocked seam at the waist and slit at the front. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed turtle neck, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted running top in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated hood and a zip at the top. Long raglan sleeves, a small zipped pocket at the back, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.

Cropped top in textured, embroidered mesh decorated with rhinestone and sequin appliqués and plastic beads. Button at the back of the neck, lacing down the back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Lined bodice.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist with glittery elastication and a flower at one side, and a double-layered tulle skirt. Lined.
Large scarf in soft, gently draping satin with an all-over print.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
